title: Outfit Copy
description:
Copy everyone's outfit.

:copy x - Copy someone
:outfitcombine x y type - Combine outfits
(type: a number between 1-3 that defines the type of combination. If empty, 3 will be used.)
:outfitcycle - Cycle through the outfits of everyone in the room
:outfitstop - Stop the command above.

Re-enter the room after installing.
